name: Ronaldinho Soccer 98
overview: This is a ROM hack of the popular "International Superstar Soccer Deluxe" from peruvian group "Twin Eagles Group", the same creators of "Campeonato Brasileiro 96" and "Ronaldinho Soccer 97" for the SNES, plus "Ronaldinho Soccer 64" for the Nintendo 64. Players names are now based on it's real life counterparts and a brand new narration in "portuguese" brings an extra layer of fun to the classic. The gameplay mechanic is exactly the same as the original game.
